Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Modulating Prelude

c. 1777 · KV1,2 – · KV3 – (first half), 626a II/I (second half) · KV6 – (first half), Anh. C 15.11 (second half)

[[IMSLP page 1] · [IMSLP page 2]

This prelude is in two halves; the first modulates from F major to E minor and the second modulates from E minor to C major. The original manuscript became separated and was for many years believed to constitute two separate pieces. The first half is not found in the Köchel catalogue, whilst the second is listed in the third and sixth versions of the catalogue as a cadenza for a piano concerto.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/27/2 · BA 4584-02 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Einzelstücke · ed. Wolfgang Plath [both halves, but separately]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5745 · Einzelstücke für Klavier · ed. Wolfgang Plath
  • Henle · HN 22 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Henle · HN 23 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Könemann · K 113 · Klavierstücke · ed. István Máriássy [first half]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50230 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Spätere Werke · ed. Ulrich Leisinger

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3
